actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require a 60 percent majority vote of the Senate and House of Representatives for passage of a resolution making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year.

summary.text: Requires a 60 percent majority vote of the Senate and the House of Representatives for passage of a resolution making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to require a 60 percent majority vote of the Senate and House of Representatives for passage of a resolution making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year.
